content:
Today I chose PR 19632 for discussion!

WIP CI
Created by @blizzard_inc (@edegeltje) on 2024-11-30
Labels: CI

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

this PR is a draft, solely used by me to test workflows triggered by changes in PR status... i'd personally like to not have to re-create a PR every time i want to prototype a workflow. should i get rid of it? mark it with WIP tag? or something else?
You could turn it into a draft PR, that should kick it off the queue.
I'm not sure about the draft: I think that the triage bot does not make that distinction.

Violeta Hernández said:

You could turn it into a draft PR, that should kick it off the queue.

Like I said, it is a draft PR
I think the answer is "ignore the occasional pings in this stream"
